dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S104 IS: Overturn Biden’s Offshore Energy Ban Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cruz introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To rescind Presidential memoranda on the withdrawal of certain areas of the outer Continental Shelf from oil or natural gas leasing.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Overturn Biden’s Offshore Energy Ban Act.

section.header: Rescission of Presidential Memoranda on the withdrawal of certain areas of the outer Continental Shelf
section.text: The following Presidential memoranda shall have no force or effect:

paragraph.text: The Presidential memorandum entitled Memorandum on the Withdrawal of Certain Areas of the United States Outer Continental Shelf from Oil or Natural Gas Leasing, and dated January 6, 2025, relating to the Gulf of Mexico, Atlantic, and Pacific areas of the outer Continental Shelf.

The Presidential memorandum entitled Memorandum on the Withdrawal of Certain Areas of the United States Outer Continental Shelf from Oil or Natural Gas Leasing, and dated January 6, 2025, relating to the Bering Sea areas of the outer Continental Shelf.
